languages.text: "Боюсь что так, Ваша Светлость. Атака на дворец началась позже прочих, когда резервные силы были переброшены в другие регионы. Что... особенно странно..." {n}Клеменциа запинается.{/n} "Они не позарились на город, на вершине которого расположена ваша резиденция. Клин вражеских сил ударил точно во дворец".

"I'm afraid so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The attack on the palace began later than the rest, once the reserve forces had been transferred to other regions. Which is... particularly odd..." {n}Clementia falters.{/n} "They weren't tempted by an entire city, at the apex of which your residence stands. No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace specifically."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь что так, Ваша Светлость. Атака на дворец началась позже прочих, когда резервные силы были переброшены в другие регионы. Что... особенно странно..." {n}Клеменциа запинается.{/n} "Они не позарились на город, на вершине которого расположена ваша резиденция. Клин вражеских сил ударил точно во дворец".

No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace precisely."

No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace specifically."

Which is... particularly odd..." {n}Clementia falters.{/n} "They weren't tempted by an entire city, at the apex of which your residence stands. No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace specifically."

languages.text: 「残念ながらそのようです、陛下。宮殿への襲撃は都市部より後に、予備軍が他の地域に派遣されてから行われました。奇妙なことですが…」{n}クレメンティアはたじろぐ。{/n}「奴らは陛下の住居を頂点とする都市全体が目的だったわけではありません。敵軍の狙いは宮殿でした」
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The attack on the palace began later than the rest, once the reserve forces had been transferred to other regions. Which is... particularly odd..." {n}Clementia falters.{/n} "They weren't tempted by an entire city, at the apex of which your residence stands. No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace specifically."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ながらそのようです、陛下。宮殿への襲撃は都市部より後に、予備軍が他の地域に派遣されてから行われました。奇妙なことですが…」{n}クレメンティアはたじろぐ。{/n}「奴らは陛下の住居を頂点とする都市全体が目的だったわけではありません。敵軍の狙いは宮殿でした」

languages.text: “恐怕正是如此，大人。那群异形先是攻击了其他区域，当后备部队都被调走之后，他们才对宫殿发起了进攻。这实在是……太古怪了……”{n}克莱门缇雅欲言又止。{/n}“他们袭击的目标并不是您的首都，并不是这座城市本身。不，从一开始，他们的目标就是这座宫殿。”
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The attack on the palace began later than the rest, once the reserve forces had been transferred to other regions. Which is... particularly odd..." {n}Clementia falters.{/n} "They weren't tempted by an entire city, at the apex of which your residence stands. No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace specifically."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕正是如此，大人。那群异形先是攻击了其他区域，当后备部队都被调走之后，他们才对宫殿发起了进攻。这实在是……太古怪了……”{n}克莱门缇雅欲言又止。{/n}“他们袭击的目标并不是您的首都，并不是这座城市本身。不，从一开始，他们的目标就是这座宫殿。”

languages.text: «Eso me temo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El ataque al palacio empezó después del resto, cuando las reservas ya habían sido enviadas a otras regiones. Lo que resulta... especialmente raro...». {n}Clementia flaquea.{/n} «No les interesaba una ciudad entera con su residencia en lo más alto. No, el grueso de las fuerzas enemigas acudió específicamente al palacio».
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The attack on the palace began later than the rest, once the reserve forces had been transferred to other regions. Which is... particularly odd..." {n}Clementia falters.{/n} "They weren't tempted by an entire city, at the apex of which your residence stands. No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace specifically."

traits.locale_text: «Eso me temo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. El ataque al palacio empezó después del resto, cuando las reservas ya habían sido enviadas a otras regiones. Lo que resulta... especialmente raro...». {n}Clementia flaquea.{/n} «No les interesaba una ciudad entera con su residencia en lo más alto. No, el grueso de las fuerzas enemigas acudió específicamente al palacio».

languages.text: « J'en ai bien peur, Votre Seigneurie. L'attaque du palais a débuté après les autres, après que les troupes de réserve ont été transférées à d'autres régions. Ce qui est pour le moins étrange... » {n}La voix de Clémentia vacille.{/n} « Ils ne se sont pas intéressés au reste de la ville, que surplombe votre résidence. Non, les forces ennemies ciblaient votre palais et rien d'autre. »
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The attack on the palace began later than the rest, once the reserve forces had been transferred to other regions. Which is... particularly odd..." {n}Clementia falters.{/n} "They weren't tempted by an entire city, at the apex of which your residence stands. No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace specifically."

traits.locale_text: « J'en ai bien peur, Votre Seigneurie. L'attaque du palais a débuté après les autres, après que les troupes de réserve ont été transférées à d'autres régions. Ce qui est pour le moins étrange... » {n}La voix de Clémentia vacille.{/n} « Ils ne se sont pas intéressés au reste de la ville, que surplombe votre résidence. Non, les forces ennemies ciblaient votre palais et rien d'autre. »

languages.text: "Leider ja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Angriff auf den Palast begann erst später, als die Reservetruppen bereits in andere Regionen unterwegs waren. Und das ist ... sehr merkwürdig ..." {n}Clementia stockt.{/n} "Sie zeigten kein Interesse an der Stadt, an deren Ende Eure Residenz liegt. Nein, die feindlichen Truppen haben sich speziell auf den Palast konzentriert."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The attack on the palace began later than the rest, once the reserve forces had been transferred to other regions. Which is... particularly odd..." {n}Clementia falters.{/n} "They weren't tempted by an entire city, at the apex of which your residence stands. No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace specifically."

traits.locale_text: "Leider ja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Der Angriff auf den Palast begann erst später, als die Reservetruppen bereits in andere Regionen unterwegs waren. Und das ist ... sehr merkwürdig ..." {n}Clementia stockt.{/n} "Sie zeigten kein Interesse an der Stadt, an deren Ende Eure Residenz liegt. Nein, die feindlichen Truppen haben sich speziell auf den Palast konzentriert."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, korkarım durum bu. Saraya yapılan saldırı; diğer saldırılardan sonra, ihtiyattaki kuvvetlerimizi diğer bölgelere göndermemizin ardından gerçekleşti. Durum... Hayli tuhaf..." {n}Clementia sendeliyor.{/n} "Konutunuzun etrafını saran koca şehri işgale gelmemişler. Düşmanların büyük kısmı, doğrudan sarayınızı hedef aldı."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid so, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The attack on the palace began later than the rest, once the reserve forces had been transferred to other regions. Which is... particularly odd..." {n}Clementia falters.{/n} "They weren't tempted by an entire city, at the apex of which your residence stands. No, the wedge of the enemy forces targeted the palace specifically."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, korkarım durum bu. Saraya yapılan saldırı, diğer saldırılardan sonra gerçekleşti. İhtiyattaki kuvvetlerimizi diğer bölgelere göndermemizin ardından. Durum... Hayli tuhaf..." {n}Clementia sendeliyor.{/n} "Sarayınızın çevresini saran koca şehri işgale gelmemişler. Düşmanların büyük kısmı, doğrudan sarayınızı hedef aldı."
